caption.center: GERD K. COBB-ADAMS, Respondent-Appellee, v. KOGA ENGINEERING AND
CONSTRUCTION, INC. and KEMPER EMPLOYERS INSURANCE COMPANY,

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CASE NO. AB 2003-501 (WH) (9-99-00397))

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: NAKAYAMA, J., for the court.[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Levinson, Nakayama, Acoba, and Duffy, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Petitioners-Appellants' application for writ of certiorari filed on July 29, 2008, is hereby rejected.Page 1
